LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Scatter_Railgun.label: 3HST "NCQ Sprayer" Scatterailgun
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Scatter_Railgun.description: A pistol-sized automatic scatterailgun developed by 3HST Limited during the Third Elven Civil War.

LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Scatter_Railgun_Heavy.descripti: A Machinegun-sized automatic scatterailgun developed by 3HST Limited during the Third Elven Civil War.
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Scatter_Railgun_Pump.label: 3HST "NCQ Splasher" Scatterailgun
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Scatter_Railgun_Pump.descriptio: A old school pump action scatterailgun developed by 3HST Limited during the Third Elven Civil War.
